text:
Hr. Robert VanDuyn
Associate Director
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Mr. VanDuyn:
Thanks for information on the hotel
situation In Battle Creek next week. We*11
proceed to get reservations at the Battle Creek
Sanitarium.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
Treasurer
FESifmh
blind copy - J. Miles
